name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】SPACE for Virtual GHOST【#星街すいせい3周年LIVE】 [Ajwv4ANSSg0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Introduction and countdown sequence for the 3rd YouTube Live 'SPACE for Virtual GHOST'.
Hoshimachi Suisei performs the song 'Dancing in the moonlight'.

subtitles.original: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!
subtitles.english: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!

subtitles.original: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!
subtitles.english: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!

subtitles.original: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!
subtitles.english: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!

subtitles.original: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!
subtitles.english: Welcome, Welcome, Welcome, Welcome to Virtual GHOST!

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: 一度きりの人生の 一秒も 後悔したくない 絶対
subtitles.english: I don't want to regret even a single second of my one and only life, absolutely.

subtitles.original: 見えない明日に 描き出す希望を 諦めたくないよ 行くよ Look at me
subtitles.english: I don't want to give up on the hope I draw for an unseen tomorrow, let's go, Look at me.

subtitles.original: Everybody's alright
subtitles.english: Everybody's alright

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしがらないで 常識は捨てて 右の頬に Kiss me now
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, throw away common sense, Kiss me now on my right cheek.

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight 聞かせてあげる Music
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight, I'll let you hear the music.

subtitles.original: 気が済むまで踊り出せ いつだって 一緒だよ 覚悟しててね
subtitles.english: Dance until you're satisfied, we're always together, be prepared.

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight この光 It's the night
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight, this light, It's the night.

subtitles.original: 星なく輝いて どこまでも 歌声は 響いてくのずっと
subtitles.english: Shining like a star, forever and ever, my singing voice will keep echoing.

subtitles.original: みんなお待たせしました！
subtitles.english: Everyone, sorry to keep you waiting!

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: 今日も月の下で 待ち合わせ でも準備が全然 終わんないよ
subtitles.english: Meeting under the moon again today, but I'm not finished getting ready at all.

subtitles.original: 会いたい すぐに会いたい 焦る気持ちを しずめなきゃ
subtitles.english: I want to see you, I want to see you right away, I have to calm my racing heart.

subtitles.original: 歌う準備 歌は愛 歌は希望 よし これで大丈夫
subtitles.english: Ready to sing, song is love, song is hope, alright, this is okay.

subtitles.original: Everybody let's go!
subtitles.english: Everybody let's go!

subtitles.original: 眠れない夜に サヨナラ
subtitles.english: Goodbye to the sleepless nights.

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: 夢まで届く Don't you imagine
subtitles.english: Reaching all the way to your dreams, Don't you imagine.

subtitles.original: I just only love
subtitles.english: I just only love

subtitles.original: 後ろの方まで全部見えてるよ！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: I can see all the way to the back! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Dancing in the moonlight
subtitles.english: Dancing in the moonlight

subtitles.original: 星空連れてって 銀河の果てまで 止まらないで Don't stop Don't stop
subtitles.english: Take me to the starry sky, to the edge of the galaxy, don't stop, Don't stop Don't stop.

subtitles.original: ぶつけた想い君に 熱い想い全部 代わらないよ Oh my darling
subtitles.english: The feelings I struck you with, all my hot feelings, won't change, Oh my darling.
